fields.name: Passives:
fields.value: - Search: Learn 3 players and a role. One of them is that role (Susceptible). [Activates D2]

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Observe: Learn a random Attacking card played by Chaos this phase at the end of the phase (Uncertain). [3 uses, 2 CD, Day-Only, Unlocks D2] 
- Tapwire: Choose a player. Find out if they played an Attacking card this phase at the end of the phase. [3 uses]
- Trace: Pick a card and a player. Learn if that player played that card. [4 uses, 2 CD, Astral]
- Scavenge: Gain a non-Special Item card of your choice. Gain a use for every 3 players you outlive. [2 uses, 1 CD, Recharging, 0/3]
